title: The Heather-Moon
author: Williamson, C. N. (Charles Norris)
snippet: At Carronbridge we saw the woods of Drumlanrig on our right hand; andSir S. told me about the Duke of Queensberry who spent all his money inbuilding the splendid castle, slept in it one night, saw the bills forit, cursed himself and it, and went away with nothing left but a brokenheart.
